doc.title: 15 Filhos
doc.plot: Fifteen individuals tell how it was to be children of dissidents killed, imprisoned or "disappeared" by a Brazilian military dictatorship. The camera becomes a kind of confessional as these survivors time-trip back to childhood. The directors themselves participate in this testimonial.
